caption.p: ( a) Comparison of the FTIR transmittance spectra of B(OH) 3 (red), B(OMgCl) 3 (blue), and THF (green) from 400 to 3800 cm –1. ( b) Powder XRD pattern of B(OMgCl) 3. ( c) 1H NMR spectra of B(OMgCl) 3 filtrate with DMSO- d 6 (blue) and B(OH) 3 dissolved in DMSO- d 6 (red). ( d) 11B NMR spectra of B(OMgCl) 3 (blue) and B(OH) 3 (red) dissolved in CD 3OD/CD 3CO 2D (50/50 vol%).
